lines.text:
[to Thorn]
I'm not going to Alaska. I'm having too much fun in New York.

[to Vee]
You're prettier than my top sergeant, but, baby, you talk just like him.

[Approaching the cabin]
Oh, this is beautiful, Mr. Trent!
Yeah, just like San Quentin. Come on, warden!
Mr. Trent, you're giving us a great deal of trouble. Why didn't you stay in New York with your drunken friends of the night club?
